Package org.jungrapht.visualization.layout.algorithms

Class BalloonLayoutAlgorithm<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jungrapht.visualization.layout.algorithms.TreeLayoutAlgorithm<V>
      • org.jungrapht.visualization.layout.algorithms.BalloonLayoutAlgorithm<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Balloon, LayoutAlgorithm<V>, TreeLayout<V>
    public class BalloonLayoutAlgorithm<V>
extends TreeLayoutAlgorithm<V>
implements TreeLayout<V>, Balloon
    A Layout implementation that assigns positions to Tree or Graph vertices using associations with nested circles ("balloons"). A balloon is nested inside another balloon if the first balloon's subtree is a subtree of the second balloon's subtree.
    Author:
    Tom Nelson
